b56.title: Gap junction mediated signaling between satellite glia and neurons in trigeminal ganglia
b56.reason: This study uses dual whole-cell voltage clamp methodology to quantify gap junction-mediated coupling between SGCs and neurons in dissociated trigeminal ganglion cultures

b134.title: Satellite glial cells modulate cholinergic transmission between sympathetic neurons
b134.reason: This paper shows that SGCs in sympathetic ganglia modulate neuron-to-neuron cholinergic neurotransmission, promote synapse formation and contribute to neuronal survival

b138.title: Ganglionic GFAP+ glial Gq-GPCR signaling enhances heart functions in vivo
b138.reason: This study shows that stimulation of SGCs in sympathetic ganglia influences cardiac functions via actions of SGCs on sympathetic neurons

b155.title: Neuron-Interacting Satellite Glial Cells in Human Trigeminal Ganglia Have an APC Phenotype
b155.reason: This paper shows that SGCs in human trigeminal ganglia display some properties of immune cells and have a unique leukocyte phenotype
